revised_title: Truncation Criteria and Algorithm for the Reduction to Normal Form of Catastrophe Unfoldings - II: Singularities with Non-zero Rank
tldr: The authors extend the solution to the reduction of unfoldings to normal form for singularities with non-zero rank. They introduce a truncation theorem and a splitting algorithm that can be implemented by computer algebra, allowing for the reduction of an arbitrary elementary catastrophe to normal form.
